articles.content:
Legendary Welsh referee Nigel Owens is retiring from international rugby.
The hugely popular official has announced he is hanging up his whistle on the Test stage after 17 years.
Owens recently too… [+6220 chars]

articles.author: Sean Bradbury, Peter Harris, Sam Carroll, Connor O'Neill
articles.title: Diogo Jota, Alisson and every Liverpool injury with return dates before Fulham - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool injuries and round-up of estimated return dates for players including Diogo Jota, Thiago Alcantara, Jordan Henderson, Naby Keita ahead of Fulham in the Premier League.
articles.content:
Liverpool face Fulham in the Premier League on Sunday afternoon as their injury problems continue.
The bad luck continued on Wednesday night after Jurgen Klopp confirmed on Friday that both Diogo Jo… [+5009 chars]

articles.author: Freddie Keighley
articles.title: Juventus 'not against' swapping Cristiano Ronaldo for Man Utd's Paul Pogba - Mirror Online
articles.description: Juventus are exploring ways of securing a deal for Pogba after his agent, Mino Raiola, declared the midfielder "needs a new club" in an interview earlier this week
articles.content:
Juventus would reportedly consider a swap deal which would see Paul Pogba return to Turin and Cristiano Ronaldo rejoin Manchester United. 
 Pogba, 27, is destined to leave Old Trafford after his age… [+2511 chars]
